title: Simulation/VR-Based Science Project Management Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience using online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning utilizing VR simulations and project management tools in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Students can develop a science project plan within 8 weeks using project management tools such as Kanban boards and Gantt charts.
Students can complete over 90% of the science experiment design and problem-solving process through real-time collaboration with team members in a VR simulation environment.
By applying project management methodologies (Agile/Scrum), students can transparently share team role assignments and progress status at over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
